creator: eric_suen_cn@hotmail.com
text:
The jspx code:

<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<fo:root xmlns:jsp="http://java.sun.com/JSP/Page" 
xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format">
 <fo:block id="test" font-weight="bold" color="blue" font-size="12pt">
  <jsp:element name="fo:inline">
   <jsp:attribute name="font-size">9pt</jsp:attribute>
   <!-- -->
   <jsp:attribute name="color">red</jsp:attribute>
   <jsp:attribute name="font-weight">bold</jsp:attribute>
   <jsp:body>Hello World</jsp:body>
  </jsp:element>
 </fo:block>
</fo:root>

the output of resion 3.0.7 is:
<fo:inline font-size="9pt" color="red" font-weight="bold">Hello 
World</fo:inline>

and the tomcat 5.0.19 is:
<fo:inline font-size="9pt">Hello World</fo:inline>

Regards

The spec (page 1.124) does not seems to allow for comments in between
jsp:attribute's.  However, this can be a spec oversight.

Fixed in CVS.
creator: kin-man.chung@sun.com
